20101205070116.286|20101205070117.714|CCO|>>> PRIOR TO THE GAME TEMPERS 
20101205070117.714|20101205070119.143|CCO|FLARED IN A PARKING AREA NORTH 
20101205070119.143|20101205070120.571|CCO|OF THE STADIUM.
20101205070120.571|20101205070122.000|CCO|POLICE SAY IT INVOLVED UP TO 75 
20101205070122.000|20101205070123.429|CCO|PEOPLE.
20101205070123.429|20101205070124.857|CCO|ANGIE KRAUSE LIVE AT THE ROSE 
20101205070124.857|20101205070126.286|CCO|BOWL WITH THE LATEST DETAILS.

20101205070134.000|20101205070136.000|CCO|HAND.

20101205070158.667|20101205070202.000|CCO|EARLY AS 6:00 A.M. FOR SOME.
